text: (On the day when We gather them) the disbelievers and their gods (all together, then We say unto those who ascribed partners) to Allah: idols: (Stand back) stop, (ye and your (pretended) partners (of Allah)) you and your idols! (And We separate them, the one from the other) We separated them from their idols; and the disbelievers said: �these have commanded us to worship them instead of worshipping You�; (and their (pretended) partners say) and their idols respond: (It was not us ye worshipped) we did not command you to worship us.
